item.title: Security Review for M365 Apps for enterprise v2312
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the security review for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise, version 2312!
We have reviewed the new settings and determined that there are no additional security settings that require enforcement or modification. The Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise security baseline, version 2306, continues to be our recommended configuration which can be downloaded from the Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit.
Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise version 2312 introduced 4 new user settings. We have included a spreadsheet listing the new settings in the release to make it easier f...
